com.koucha.experimentalgame.entity

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koucha.experimentalgame.entity.PlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Controller, Updatable

    public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Receives mouse and keyboard input and generates instructions for the player Entity

      Associates actions to flags of a bit mask

      • isPressed

        private boolean isPressed(InputEvent evt)
                   throws PlayerController.InvalidStateException
        Determine if the event was caused by a press or release action
        Parameters:
        evt - key event
        Returns:
        true if the key was pressed, false if it was released
        Throws:
        PlayerController.InvalidStateException - if the key was neither pressed nor released

        Returns:
